title: MF's Animations Question.

embed.description: WIP] Miss Fortune's update is headed to the PBE soon! Continue reading for more information! "There are few who can match Miss Fortune in either. One of Bilgewater's most infamous bounty hunters, she built her legend upon a swathe of bullet-riddled corpses and captured ne'er-do-wells.

body:
I know she was just updated in PBE, But are her animations getting getting cleaned up? Like {{champion:12}},{{champion:38}}  and{{champion:57}}'s minor VU? with a stop/halt animation?

The current one in the video seems to cut off each other abruptly.

replies.body:
Yup! 

She has several new animations including run, as well as some spell animations.

Hey Katey,

   People are not liking that you took away her Grievous Wounds on her ult. Can it be given back?
Unfortunately, I don't make that call. I'd be happy to relay the feedback, though.
Please let us know. Thank you :)
She never had Grievous Wounds on her ult.
Yes she did from what I recall, her ult had impure shots in it which therefore had grievous wounds on it.
Her ult applied stacks of impure shots passive, for the damage. Not the active grievous wounds part. It still does that. It's never in any form applied Grievous Wounds.
I must have misread it somewhere then. Thanks for informing me.
My guess is that is part of the hidden power they wanted removed from her because grievous wounds is not exactly the favourite thing of some of the balance team
o.O the animations on her ulti look so weird, her arms just seem to be flailing around

Hi Katey, 

I'm kind of confused. It says you cleaned up the logic on her double up, but what does this mean exactly? Something I find frustrating when playing MF is that it seems to almost always prioritize minions. Is this what you fixed? It would be nice for it to prioritize champions (I think it used to?) Thanks ! :)
It'll better prioritize champions, as well as making it a bit more obvious where it's going to hit.

So if you q a minion, and there's a minion and a champion behind them, it should hit the champion, not the minion, right? At least that's what I'm hopeful for.
From what I understand, yes. (I had to ask Champ Update  because I was unsure about the wording myself. :P)
